description: Returns information about a log group data protection policy.

parameters.name: logGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the log group that contains the data protection policy that you want to see.

nested_items.name: logGroupIdentifier
nested_items.description: The log group name or ARN that you specified in your request.

nested_items.name: policyDocument
nested_items.description: The data protection policy document for this log group.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this policy was most recently updated.
